entry.title: Template: Bootstrap Ecommerce
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html b:css='false' b:http='true' b:version='3' class='v2' expr:dir='data:blog.languageDirection' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' xmlns:b='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/b' xmlns:data='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/data' xmlns:expr='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/expr'> <head>
<meta charset='utf-8'/>
<title> <data:blog.pageTitle/> </title>
<b:comment>
- Special thank you..
Shopping cart by : http://simplecartjs.org Theme Responsive Framework by : https://getbootstrap.com Icons by : http://fontawesome.io CDN Deliverables : https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/
Theme Developed by : http://twitter.com/_angelrivas
- Use with care. No warranty. - Theme codes not for commercial usage. - Strictly for 1 live and 1 development install. - Plugin license requirement attached. - Theme license attached.
</b:comment>
<meta content='width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1,user-scalable=no,minimal-ui' name='viewport'/> <meta content='IE=9; IE=8; IE=7; IE=EDGE; chrome=1' http-equiv='X-UA-Compatible'/> <link expr:href='data:blog.url.canonical' rel='canonical'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.url.canonical' name='twitter:url'/>
<link href='//1.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//2.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//3.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//4.bp.blogspot.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//ajax.googleapis.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//twitter.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//www.facebook.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/> <link href='//plus.google.com/' rel='dns-prefetch'/>
<b:comment>Meta Types</b:comment> <meta content='article' property='og:type'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <meta content='summary_large_image' name='twitter:card'/> <meta content='@twitter_site' name='twitter:site'/> <meta content='@twitter_creator' name='twitter:creator'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' name='application-name'/>
<b:comment>Meta Titles</b:comment> <b:if cond='data:view.isHomepage'> <b:with value='data:blog.pageTitle + " - " + data:blog.title' var='titles'> <title><data:titles/></title> <meta expr:content='data:titles' name='twitter:title'/> </b:with> <b:elseif cond='data:view.isPost or data:view.isPage'/> <b:with value='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' var='titles'> <title><data:titles/></title> <meta expr:content='data:titles' name='twitter:title'/> </b:with> <b:elseif cond='data:view.isError'/> <b:with value='"Support Page - " + data:blog.pageTitle + " - " + data:blog.title' var='titles'> <title><data:titles/></title> <meta expr:content='data:titles' name='twitter:title'/> </b:with> <b:else/> <b:with value='"All articles published in " + data:blog.pageTitle + " - " + data:blog.title' var='titles'> <title><data:titles/></title> <meta expr:content='data:titles' name='twitter:title'/> </b:with> </b:if>
<b:comment>Meta Description Support/Fallback</b:comment> <meta expr:content='data:view.description + " " + data:view.title' name='twitter:description'/>
<b:comment>Meta Images: Add image URL at var="defaultimage"...</b:comment> <b:with value='"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MowVHfLkoZU/VhgIRyPbIoI/AAAAAAAATtE/qHST4Q2YCCc/s1600/placeholder-image.jpg"' var='defaultimage'> <b:with value='data:blog.postImageUrl ? resizeImage(data:blog.postImageUrl, 900 , "4:3") : resizeImage(data:defaultimage, 900 , "4:3")' var='image'> <b:if cond='!data:blog.postImageUrl'> <meta expr:content='data:image' itemprop='image_url'/> <meta expr:content='data:image' property='og:image'/> <meta expr:content='data:image' name='twitter:image'/> <b:else/> <meta expr:content='data:image' name='twitter:image'/> </b:if> <meta content='900' property='og:image:width'/> <meta content='675' property='og:image:height'/> </b:with> </b:with> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " -- " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/>
<b:comment>Icons: Add URL to image/icons at var="icon"...</b:comment> <b:with value='"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9o0AnGZxCfY/WJwbtEfGGeI/AAAAAAAAg_4/-qiPRhCUhQ896JdZoat1Aah9obsrqkPGQCLcB/s1600/blogr-amp-215.png"' var='icon'> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,16,"1:1")' rel='icon' type='image/x-icon'/> <meta expr:content='resizeImage(data:icon,150,"1:1")' name='msapplication-TileImage'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,76,"1:1")' rel='apple-touch-icon' sizes='76x76'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,120,"1:1")' rel='apple-touch-icon' sizes='120x120'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,128,"1:1")' rel='icon' sizes='128x128'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,152,"1:1")' rel='apple-touch-icon' sizes='152x152'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,180,"1:1")' rel='apple-touch-icon' sizes='180x180'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,192,"1:1")' rel='icon' sizes='192x192'/> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:icon,215,"1:1")' rel='apple-touch-icon' sizes='215x215'/> </b:with>
<b:comment>Mobile Browser: Add color in Hex at var="themecolor"...</b:comment> <b:with value='"#FF5722"' var='themecolor'> <meta expr:content='data:themecolor' name='theme-color'/> <meta expr:content='data:themecolor' name='msapplication-TileColor'/> <meta expr:content='data:themecolor' name='msapplication-navbutton-color'/> <meta expr:content='data:themecolor' name='apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style'/> </b:with> <meta content='yes' name='mobile-web-app-capable'/> <meta content='yes' name='apple-mobile-web-app-capable'/>
<b:include data='blog' name='all-head-content'/>
<b:with value='data:blog.homepageUrl == data:blog.homepageUrl.https ? data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical.https : data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical' var='blog_url'> <script type='application/ld+json'> { "@context": "http://schema.org/", "@type": "WebSite", "name": "<data:blog.title/>", "alternateName": "<data:blog.title/> <data:blog.pageName/>", "url": "<data:blog_url/>" } </script>
<b:if cond='data:view.isHomepage'> <b:comment>Search Engine Meta Data: Add Store Contact Number...</b:comment> <script type='application/ld+json'> { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "Organization", "url": "<data:blog_url/>", "contactPoint": { "@type": "ContactPoint", "telephone": "+1-401-555-1212", "contactType": "customer service" } } </script> </b:if> </b:with>
<b:skin><![CDATA[/* ----------------------------------------------- Blogger Template Style Name: BloggCommerce PRO Designer: Angel Rivas ----------------------------------------------- */
/* Variable definitions ==================== <Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#FFAB00" value="#FFAB00"/>
<Group description="Theme Colors" selector="body"> <Variable name="accent.color" description="Accent Color" type="color" default="#FFAB00" value="#FFAB00"/> </Group>
<Group description="Body Common" selector="body"> <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body Background" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="body.font" description="Body Font" type="font" default="normal normal 15px Roboto, sans-serif" value="normal normal 15px 'Khula', sans-serif"/> <Variable name="body.font.color" description="Body Text Color" type="color" default="#5d5d5d" value="#5d5d5d"/> <Variable name="body.heading.font" description="Heading Font" type="font" default="normal normal 32px Montserrat , serif" value="normal bold 32px Montserrat , serif"/> <Variable name="body.heading.color" description="Heading Color" type="color" default="#5d5d5d" value="#5d5d5d"/> </Group>
<Group description="Links" selector=".main-outer"> <Variable name="link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#FF3D00" value="#FF3D00"/> <Variable name="link.visited" description="Link Visited Color" type="color" default="#FF3D00" value="#FF3D00"/> <Variable name="link.hover" description="Link Hover Color" type="color" default="#FF3D00" value="#FF3D00"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header" selector=".header-wrapper"> <Variable name="header.background" description="Header Background" type="color" default="#DD2C00" value="#DD2C00"/> <Variable name="header.color" description="Header Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="header.border" description="Header Border Color" type="color" default="$(header.background)" value="#DD2C00"/> <Variable name="header.link.color" description="Header Link Color" type="color" default="$(link.color)" value="#EEEEEE"/> <Variable name="header.logo.font" description="Header Logo Font" type="font" default="normal bold 400% Montserrat, serif" value="normal bold 400% 'Euphoria Script', serif"/> <Variable name="header.logo.color" description="Header Logo Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="header.caption.font" description="Header Caption Font" type="font" default="normal normal 90% Montserrat, sans-serif" value="normal normal 90% Montserrat, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="header.caption.color" description="Header Caption Color" type="color" default="#f7f7f7" value="#f7f7f7"/> </Group>
<Group description="Navbar" selector=".navbar-custom"> <Variable name="navbar.background" description="Navbar Background" type="color" default="#DD2C00" value="#DD2C00"/> <Variable name="navbar.color" description="Navbar Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="navbar.drop.background" description="Navbar Dropdown Background" type="color" default="#424242" value="#424242"/> <Variable name="navbar.drop.color" description="Navbar Dropdown Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="navbar.drop.border" description="Navbar Border Color" type="color" default="#222222" value="#222222"/> <Variable name="navbar.font" description="Navbar Font" type="font" default="$(body.font)" value="normal normal 15px 'Khula', sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Slider" selector=".slider-wrapper"> <Variable name="slider.background" description="Header Background" type="color" default="#f7f7f7" value="#f7f7f7"/> <Variable name="slider.font" description="Slider Font" type="font" default="normal normal 300% Montserrat , serif" value="normal normal 300% Montserrat , serif"/> <Variable name="slider.color" description="Slider Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="slider.highlight" description="Slider Highlights" type="color" default="#BDBDBD" value="#BDBDBD"/> </Group>
<Group description="Content" selector=".content"> <Variable name="content.background" description="Content Background" type="color" default="transparent" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> <Variable name="content.border.color" description="Content Border Color" type="color" default="#eeeeee" value="#eeeeee"/> <Variable name="sitelinks.background" description="Sitelinks Background" type="color" default="$(body.background.color)" value="transparent"/> <Variable name="sitelinks.color" description="Sitlinks Color" type="color" default="$(body.font.color)" value="#424242"/> </Group>
<Group description="Checkout Page" selector=".content"> <Variable name="checkout.background" description="Checkout Background" type="color" default="#f9f9f9" value="transparent"/> <Variable name="checkout.form" description="Checkout Form Background" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="checkout.border.color" description="Checkout Border Color" type="color" default="#F5F5F5" value="#F5F5F5"/> <Variable name="checkout.alt.color" description="Checkout Alt Color" type="color" default="#616161" value="#616161"/> </Group>
<Group description="Footer" selector=".footer-wrapper"> <Variable name="footer.background" description="Footer Background" type="color" default="#f9f9f9" value="#f9f9f9"/> <Variable name="footer.color" description="Footer Font Color" type="color" default="#616161" value="#616161"/> <Variable name="footer.link.color" description="Footer Link Color" type="color" default="#5d5d5d" value="#5d5d5d"/> <Variable name="footer.border.color" description="Footer Border Color" type="color" default="#ececec" value="#ececec"/> </Group>
<Group description="Status Message" selector=".status-msg-wrap"> <Variable name="status.background" description="Status Background" type="color" default="#757575" value="#757575"/> <Variable name="status.color" description="Status Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="status.link.color" description="Status Link Color" type="color" default="#FFAB00" value="#FFAB00"/> <Variable name="status.border.color" description="Status Border Color" type="color" default="#ececec" value="#ececec"/> </Group>
<Group description="Comments" selector=".comments"> <Variable name="comments.background" description="Comments Background" type="color" default="transparent" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> <Variable name="comments.color" description="Comments Font Color" type="color" default="#666666" value="#5d5d5d"/> <Variable name="comments.border.color" description="Comments Border Color" type="color" default="#E0E0E0" value="#E0E0E0"/> <Variable name="comments.header.background" description="Comments Header Background" type="color" default="#E0E0E0" value="#f7f7f7"/> <Variable name="comments.header.color" description="Comments Header Color" type="color" default="#5d5d5d" value="#5d5d5d"/> </Group>
<Group description="Images" selector=".content"> <Variable name="image.background" description="Image Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="image.border" description="Image Border Color" type="color" default="#eeeeee" value="#ececec"/> <Variable name="image.color" description="Image Caption Color" type="color" default="$(body.text.color)" value="#666666"/> </Group>
<Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none no-repeat scroll center center"/> <Variable name="body.background.override" description="Body Background Override" type="string" default="" value=""/>
*/
/* Blogger resets */ a{text-decoration: none !important;} #Attribution1, #Navbar1 { display:none; visibility:hidden; } body .navbar { height: auto; } .widget { line-height: inherit; margin:0; } .widget ul { line-height: inherit; } .widget .widget-item-control, .widget .clear { display:none; visibility:hidden; } .post-header, .post-footer { line-height: inherit; } .widget li { padding-top:0; padding-bottom:0; margin-bottom:0; } .status-msg-wrap { margin:0; width: auto; font-size: inherit; } .status-msg-body { padding: 0; width: 100%; position: static; } .status-msg-border { border: 0; opacity: 1; width: auto; position: static; line-height:1; } .status-msg-bg { background-color: transparent; opacity: 1; width: auto; position: static; line-height:1; } .status-msg-hidden { padding: 0; display:none; } abbr[title] { border-bottom: 0; }
.post-author-profile-pic{ vertical-align: middle; width: 35px; height: 35px; border-radius: 50%; }
.separator {display: block; flex: 0 0 auto !important; width: 33% !important;}
.CSS_LIGHTBOX {z-index: 9999999999 !important;}
// Floating label input .form-floating.mb-3 input(id="floating-input", type="text", placeholder="John").form-control label(for="floating-input") Your name
// Floating label select .form-floating.mb-3 select(id="floating-select").form-select option(selected) Open this select menu option() One option() Two option() Three label(for="floating-select") Choose option
.text-light { color: #e2ffc0 !important; }
#ContactForm1_contact-form-error-message { color: #f23c49; background-color: #feeced; border-color: #fabbbf; position: relative;padding: 1rem 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; border: 1px solid transparent; border-radius: 0.5rem; }
#ContactForm1_contact-form-success-message { color: #07c98b; background-color: #e6faf3; border-color: #a8ecd6; position: relative;padding: 1rem 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; border: 1px solid transparent; border-radius: 0.5rem; }
button#ContactForm1_contact-form-submit {color: #FFF !important; background-color: #05c585 !important; border-color: #05c585 !important; box-shadow: unset;display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.5; color: #666276; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: middle; cursor: pointer; -webkit-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; user-select: none; background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid transparent; padding: 0.575rem 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; transition: color .2s ease-in-out,background-color .2s ease-in-out,border-color .2s ease-in-out,box-shadow .2s ease-in-out;}
::-webkit-scrollbar { -webkit-appearance: none; } ::-webkit-scrollbar:vertical { width: 6px; } ::-webkit-scrollbar:horizontal { height: 6px; } ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: #333; border-radius: 6px; border: 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,.15); } ::-webkit-scrollbar-track { border-radius: 100%; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.15); } ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: $(accent.color); border: 2px solid $(accent.color); } ::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.15); }
/* Forms */ input:focus, textarea:focus,select:focus,radio:focus,.form-control:focus { border-color:#ddd; outline:0; box-shadow:inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.075),0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,.6); } ::-moz-selection { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } ::selection { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } input:-webkit-autofill, textarea:-webkit-autofill, select:-webkit-autofill { background-color: #eee } table { border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing:0; } .clearfix, .clear { display: table; width: 100%; clear: both; font-size: 0; } .post-body img, .widget img { max-width:100%; height: auto; } [placeholder=placeholder]{ line-height:1.2; margin-top:0; } .btn { border-radius:2px; }
.btn.btn-custom { background-color: $(accent.color); border-color:transparent; } .btn.btn-custom:hover, .btn.btn-custom:focus, .btn.btn-custom:active, .btn.btn-custom.active { background-color: $(accent.color); border-color:transparent; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.055); outline:0; } .input-group .btn:focus,.input-group .btn:active, button:focus, .btn:focus, a:focus, button:active, .btn:active, a:active { outline:0; border-color:transparent; }
/* Status Message */ .status-msg-wrap {text-align: left;padding: 12px 24px;border: 0px solid #ececec;background-color: #28400c;color: #ffffff;border-radius: 9px;} .status-msg-body { text-align:left; } .status-msg-wrap a { text-transform: uppercase; display:table-cell; float:right; padding: 6px 12px; font-weight:700; margin-top:-6px; margin-right: -24px; } .page-error .status-msg-wrap a { float: none; padding:0; margin:0; background-color: inherit; color: inherit; } .page-error .status-msg-wrap { margin-top:40px; margin-bottom:40px; background-color: transparent; color: inherit; }
.brand { font: $(header.logo.font); font-size:inherit; line-height:inherit; }
/* Header */ .header-wrapper { background-color: $(header.background); color: $(header.color); } .header-wrapper .section { margin-left:0; margin-right: 0; } .header { margin:0; } .header-wrapper .Header h1, .header-wrapper .Header h2 { font: $(header.logo.font); margin:0; color: $(header.logo.color); text-align:center; box-shadow: 0 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.35); } .header-wrapper .Header a { color: $(header.logo.color); } .header-wrapper a { color: $(header.link.color); } .Header .titlewrapper { padding-top:24px; margin-bottom: 15px; } .Header .description { font: $(header.caption.font); color: $(header.caption.color); line-height:1.428; margin:0; margin-bottom: 24px; display:none; box-shadow: 0 0 -1px rgba(0,0,0,.35); } #header-inner { background-position: center!important; margin:0 auto; max-width:100%; } .Header img { margin:0 auto; } @media (min-width:768px){ .Header .description {display:block; } .Header .titlewrapper { padding-top:60px; margin-bottom: 15px; } .header-wrapper .Header h1, .header-wrapper .Header h2 { text-align: left; } } .header-wrapper #header-cart { margin-top: 24px; margin-bottom:24px; text-align:center; } #header-cart h2, #header-cart h3, #header-cart h4 { color: $(header.color); } .header-wrapper #header-cart .title { margin:0; font-size: 100%; } .header-wrapper #header-cart .widget-content { margin-bottom: 15px; } @media (min-width:768px){ .header-wrapper #header-cart { margin-top: 60px; text-align: right; } }
[data-target="#mySearch"], [data-target="#myCart"] { position:relative; } [data-target="#myCart"] .simpleCart_quantity { font-size:11px; display:inline-block; height:20px; width:20px; line-height:20px; background-color: #aaa; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.15); opacity: .87; color:#fff; border-radius:100%; margin-top:0px; vertical-align:top; } [data-target="#myCart"]:hover .simpleCart_quantity { opacity:1; } @media (max-width:767px){ #header-ads { display:none; } }
/* Navbar */ .navbar-custom { background-color: $(navbar.background); font: $(navbar.font); line-height: inherit; border:0; border-bottom: 1px solid $(header.border); border-radius:0; margin-bottom: 0; box-shadow: none; } .navbar-custom .section { margin-left:0; margin-right:0; } .navbar-custom .navbar-collapse { padding-left:0; padding-right:0; } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li>a { color: $(navbar.color); opacity:.87; } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li>a .fa { margin-left:5px; } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li>a:hover, .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li>a:focus { color: $(navbar.color); opacity:1; } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li.open>a, .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li.open>a:hover, .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li.open>a:focus { background-color: transparent; color: $(navbar.color); opacity:1; } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li.open>.dropdown-menu { background-color: $(navbar.drop.background); border-color: transparent; color: $(navbar.drop.color); border-top-color: $(navbar.drop.border); border-radius:0; padding-top:8px; padding-bottom:8px; min-width: 180px; } .navbar-custom .dropdown-menu>li>a { padding-top:8px; padding-bottom:8px; opacity:.87; color: $(navbar.drop.color); } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu>li>a:hover, .navbar-custom .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu>li>a:focus { background-color: transparent; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 60px rgba(0,0,0,.055); border-color: transparent; color: $(navbar.drop.color); opacity: 1; } .navbar-custom .navbar-header { margin:0 -10px; text-align:center; } .navbar-custom .navbar-toggle { color: $(navbar.color); border:0; font-size: 21px; margin-right:10px; margin-left:10px; float:none; background-color: transparent; border-color: transparent; } .navbar-custom .navbar-toggle:hover, .navbar-custom .navbar-toggle:focus { background-color: transparent; border-color: transparent; } @media (min-width:767px){ .navbar-custom .navbar-collapse { margin-left:-15px; margin-right: -15px; } .navbar-custom .dropdown.open ul>li:first-child { position:relative; } .navbar-custom .dropdown.open ul>li:first-child:before { content: ' '; width: 0; height: 0; border-style: solid; border-width: 10px 10px 0 10px; border-color: $(navbar.background) transparent transparent transparent; position:absolute; top:-9px; left:15px; } } @media (max-width:767px){ .navbar-custom .navbar-nav { padding:6px 9px; margin: 0; } .navbar-custom .navbar-collapse { margin:0 -24px; background-color: $(navbar.drop.background); } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li.open>.dropdown-menu { background-color: transparent; border-top: 1px solid $(navbar.drop.border); } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu .dropdown-header, .navbar-custom .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu > li > a { padding: 8px 15px 8px 35px; color: $(navbar.drop.color); } .navbar-custom .navbar-nav>li>a .fa { float:right; margin-top:1px; } .navbar-custom .navbar-collapse, .navbar-custom .navbar-form { border-color: $(navbar.drop.border); } }
.content .section { margin-left:0; margin-right: 0; } .content { background-color: $(content.background); }
/* Multi Pages */ @media (min-width:1200px){ .page-multi .post:nth-child(4n+1) { clear: left; } } @media (min-width:992px) and (max-width:1199px){ .page-multi .post:nth-child(4n+1) { clear: left; } } @media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:991px){ .page-multi .post:nth-child(2n+1) { clear: left; } } @media (max-width:767px){ .page-multi .post:nth-child(2n+1) { clear: left; } }
.page-multi .contents .container { border-bottom: 1px solid $(content.border.color); } .page-multi .content-wrapper, .page-multi .sidebar { padding-top:40px; padding-bottom:40px; } .page-multi .post { font-size: 13px; } .page-multi .post-title { font-size: inherit; font-weight:400; margin: 0 0 20px; opacity: .87; } .page-multi .post-title>a { color: inherit; } .page-multi .post-body { display: none; } .page-multi .post-body img { display:none; background-color: $(image.background); } .page-multi .panel { border: 0; box-shadow: none; background-color: transparent; } .page-multi .panel-image { border: 1px solid $(image.border); } .page-multi .panel-body { padding-bottom: 0; padding-left:0; padding-right:0; } .page-multi .panel-footer{ border: 0; background-color:transparent; padding: 0; } .page-multi .jump-link { display: inline-block; padding: 8px 24px; } .page-multi .post-price { margin-bottom: 20px; border:0; } .page-multi .item_price { font-weight:700; } .page-multi .item_pricebefore { opacity:.54; display:block; }
@media (min-width:1200px){ .page-home .post:nth-child(4n+1) { clear: none; } .page-home .post:nth-child(6n+1) { clear: left; } }
/* Single Pages */ .page-single .content-wrapper, .page-single .sidebar { padding-top:40px; padding-bottom:40px; } .page-single .post-body { padding-bottom:40px; } .page-item .post-title { font-size: 100%; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing:1px; margin-top: 0; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom:10px; } .post-price { margin-bottom:40px; border-bottom:1px solid $(content.border.color); } .post-image-inner { border-radius: 0.75rem; } .post-image-thumbnail { margin-top:30px; margin-bottom:30px; } .post-image-thumbnail img { width:25%; height:auto; border: 2px solid transparent; } .post-image-thumbnail a { margin-left: auto!important; margin-right: auto!important; } .post-title { margin-top:0; } .page-static .content-wrapper, .page-static .sidebar { padding-top:40px; padding-bottom:40px; } .product-data { width:100%; border:0; margin-bottom: 30px; } .product-data>tbody>tr>td { border:0; padding:6px 0; vertical-align: top; } .product-data .item_quantity { width: 48px; } .product-data .item_status { text-transform: uppercase; font-weight:700; letter-spacing:1px; } .product-data .label-options { display:inline-block; width:50%; } .product-data .label-options td { display:block; } .product-data .label-options label { display: none; } .product-data .item_add { padding-left:18px; padding-right:18px; } .product-data .item_add:hover, .product-data .item_add:focus { color: #fff; background-color: $(accent.color); border-color: transparent; box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 60px rgba(0,0,0,.15); } .product-data .item_add:before { content:'\f07a'; vertical-align:middle; font-size: 23px; margin-right:12px; font-family:'FontAwesome'; } .product-data .item_price, .product-data .item_pricebefore, .alt-item { font: $(body.heading.font); font-weight:700; font-size:130%; } .product-data .item_pricebefore, .alt-pricebefore { text-decoration: line-through; font-size: inherit; opacity:.54; color: $(accent.color); font-weight:700; } .product-data .item_price { padding-bottom:0px; } .product-data .alt-item { padding-bottom:24px; }
@media (min-width:768px){ .page-static .main { padding-right:25px; } } .post-meta { margin-top:20px; font-size: 85%; margin-bottom:40px; } .post-timestamp { margin-left:0; } .post-meta > span { display:inline-block; margin-bottom:10px; margin-right:10px; }
/* Share Icons */ .main .post-shares { margin-bottom:40px; display:block; } .main .post-shares li { margin-bottom:4px; }
.post-footer { margin-bottom:40px; } .post-footer-line > div { display:inline-block; margin-right:40px; } .post-footer-line > div > i { float:left; min-width:40px; margin-bottom:.5em; }
.label.label-custom { color: $(link.color); background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid $(link.color); opacity:.87; display:inline-block; margin-bottom:.5em; padding: .4em .6em; } .label.label-custom:hover, .label.label-custom:focus { color: #fff; background-color: $(link.color); border: 1px solid $(link.color); opacity:1; }
/* Author Profile */ .page-static .post-footer { clear:both; } .post-footer .author-profile { padding:24px; background-color: #f9f9f9; text-align:center; overflow: inherit; margin:54px auto 0; border:0; } .author-profile img { border-radius:100%; float:none; display:block; margin:-74px auto 24px; border:6px solid $(content.background); } .author-profile [itemprop=description] { opacity:.87; font-size: 90%; } .author-profile [itemprop=name] { text-transform:uppercase; font: $(body.heading.font); font-size: inherit; font-weight:700; margin-bottom:10px; display: block; } @media (min-width:768px){ .post-footer .author-profile { text-align:left; margin:0;} .author-profile img { float:left; margin:0 24px 0 0; } .author-profile [itemprop=description] { display:table-cell; } .author-profile [itemprop=name] { display: inline-block; } }
/* Pager */ #blog-pager ol { list-style: none; display:table; margin: 0; padding:0; width:100%; } #blog-pager li { display:table-cell; width:1%; float:none; text-align:center; border-right: 1px solid $(content.border.color); border-left:1px solid transparent; border-top: 1px solid $(content.border.color); border-bottom: 1px solid $(content.border.color); padding:0; margin:0; } #blog-pager li>a { display:block; padding: 18px 12px; color: inherit; font-size: 25px; } #blog-pager li:first-child { text-align: left; } #blog-pager li:last-child { border-right-color: transparent; text-align:right; } #blog-pager .home-link { text-align:center; }
/* Sidebars */ .sidebar .widget>h2 { margin-top:0; font-size: 100%; font-weight:700; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 15px; } .sidebar .widget { margin-bottom:40px; }
/* Footer */ .footer-wrapper { background-color: $(footer.background); border-top:1px solid $(footer.border.color); padding-top: 51px; padding-bottom: 60px; color: $(footer.color); font-size: 90%; } .footer .title, .footer .widget > h2 { font-size: 90%; font-weight:700; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 24px; } .footer-wrapper h2, .footer-wrapper h3, .footer-wrapper h4, .footer-wrapper h5, .footer-wrapper h6 { color: inherit; opacity:.87; } .footer-wrapper a { color: $(footer.link.color); } .footer .widget { margin-bottom:40px; } .footer .widget:last-child { margin-bottom:40px; } .footer-wrapper .section { margin:0 auto; } .footer .PopularPosts img { width:50%; } .footer ul { list-style: none; padding-left: 0; } .footer ul>li { margin-bottom:.5em; } .credits { background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.055); border-top: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.075); margin-bottom:-60px; } .attribution { overflow:hidden; margin: 40px auto; padding:40px 24px; } #Attribution1 .widget-content { text-align:left!important; } .attribution .widget { display:inline-block; width:50%; margin:0 auto; } .attribution ul { list-style: none; padding-left:0; text-align:right; } .attribution ul>li { display:inline-block; font-size: 32px; } .attribution ul>li>a { color: inherit; opacity: .54; } @media (max-width:767px){ .attribution .widget { display:block; width:100%; margin-bottom:24px; } .attribution ul { padding-left:0; text-align:left; } } .attribution .widget>h2 { display: none; }
/* Common Widgets */ .PopularPosts ul { list-style: none; padding-left: 0; } .Label ul { list-style: none; padding-left: 0; } .Label ul li { padding: 0; } .BlogArchive ul { list-style:none; padding-left:0; } .BlogArchive #ArchiveList ul li { margin:0 0 .5em; padding:0; text-indent: 0; } .BlogArchive #ArchiveList ul ul li { padding-left:21px; } .BlogArchive #ArchiveList ul.posts li { padding-left: 21px; } .BlogArchive #ArchiveList ul { margin-top: .5em; } .BlogArchive .posts { opacity: .87; } .BlogArchive .archivedate > ul { display: block; } .BlogArchive .archivedate.collapsed > ul { display:none; } .BlogArchive .post-count-link { text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: 500; }
.sidebar .PageList ul { list-style: none; padding-left:0; } .sidebar .PageList ul>li { margin:0; padding:0; display: block; } .sidebar .PageList li>a { padding:6px 12px; display: block; } .sidebar .PageList li.selected>a{ } #sidebar2 .PageList li>a { border-left: 5px solid #eee; } #sidebar2 .PageList li.selected>a{ border-left: 5px solid $(accent.color); }
.sidebar .Label li { position:relative; line-height:1.2; } .sidebar .Label li>a { padding:6px 12px; border-left: 5px solid #eee; } .sidebar .Label li>a+span { display: table-cell; } .sidebar .Label li>span:nth-child(1) { padding:6px 12px; font-weight: 700; border-left: 5px solid $(accent.color); } .sidebar .Label li>a:hover, .sidebar .Label li>span:nth-child(1):hover { border-left: 5px solid $(accent.color); }
.sidebar { font-size: 90%; } .sidebar .Label li>a, .sidebar .Label li>a+span, .sidebar .Label li>span, .sidebar .Label li>span+span { display: table-cell; width:1%; white-space: nowrap; } .sidebar .Label li>a+span, .sidebar .Label li>span+span { text-align:right; font-size: 75%; opacity:.54; position:relative; } .sidebar .Label li>span+span:before { content:''; width:20px; height:20px; background-color: #eee; }
.FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-inner input { padding: 8px; height:auto!important; font-size:14px!important; border:1px solid #eee!important; width: 100%; } .FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-inner .follow-by-email-submit { padding: 9px 20px; width:auto; min-width:80px; border:1px solid transparent!important; background-color: $(accent.color); color: #fff; margin:0; }
.PopularPosts .item-snippet { font-size:14px; opacity:.87; } .PopularPosts .item-thumbnail { margin-bottom:10px; margin-right:0; } .PopularPosts .item-title { margin-bottom:10px; font: $(body.heading.font); font-size: inherit; } .PopularPosts li { margin-bottom:20px; }
.Profile .g-profile { background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left:20px; } .Profile { text-align:center; border: 1px solid #eee; } .Profile > h2 { margin:0; padding: 24px 0 0; } .Profile > div > a { background-color: #fff; display:block; margin: -24px -24px 0; } .Profile .profile-data { background-color: #fff; display:block; margin: 0 -24px; padding: 0 0 24px; } .Profile .profile-textblock { padding: 24px 0; } .Profile > div { padding:24px; background-color: #f9f9f9; } .Profile img { border-radius: 100%; margin: 24px 0; } .Profile .profile-link { padding:24px 0; margin-bottom:-24px; }
/* Comments */ .comments ol { list-style:none; padding-left:0; } .avatar-image-container { display:inline-block; float:left; border-radius:100%; overflow:hidden; } .loadmore { display: none; } .thread-toggle { display;inline-block; padding:10px 0; } .thread-toggle.thread-collapsed {display:block; } .thread-collapsed {display:none; } .thread-expand { display:block; } .comments .comment-header .user { font-weight:700; font-style: normal; } .comment-form iframe { margin-left:-6px; margin-right:-6px; height: 290px!important; } .comments .avatar-image-container img { max-width:40px; width:40px; height:40px; display:block; margin:0; position:relative; z-index:2; margin-top:-40px; } .comments .avatar-image-container img[src*="/blank.gif"] { display:none; } .comments .avatar-image-container { background-color:transparent; max-height: 40px; width: 40px; border-radius: 100%; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.025); color: #ccc; } .comments .avatar-image-container:before { content: '\f2be'; font-family:'FontAwesome'; font-size:18px; height: 40px; width: 40px; display:inline-block; text-align: center; z-index:1; vertical-align:middle; line-height:40px; } .comments { font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; } .comments .comment-block { margin-left: 60px; padding:12px 12px 0; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.055); margin-bottom: 24px; } .comments .comment-block .comment-header { margin: -12px -12px 0; padding:12px; background-color: #f9f9f9; overflow:hidden; } .comments .comment-block .comment-content { margin-top:0; padding-top:12px; margin-bottom:0; padding-bottom: 24px; border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.055); } .comments .comment-header .secondary-text { margin-left:10px; display:inline-block; float: right; font-style: italic; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions { padding-top:0; padding-bottom:10px; margin:0 0 0 -13px; display:inline-block; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions a { display:inline-block; padding:12px 18px; margin-right:0; margin-bottom:-12px; color:inherit; opacity:.87; } .comments .comments-content .comment-replies { margin: 10px 0 10px 60px; } .comments .comments-content .comment-thread { margin: 0; padding:0; } .comments .comments-content .comment { margin-bottom: 0; padding-bottom: 0px; } .comments .comments-content .inline-thread { padding: 0px; } .comments .comments-content .comment:first-child { padding-top: 20px; } .comments .continue > a { text-transform: uppercase; padding:6px 18px; display:inline-block; background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid #eee; cursor: pointer; margin-bottom:12px; } .comment-footer { margin: 0; padding:0 12px; background-color: #f9f9f9; } .comments #comment-form { margin-bottom: 0; } .comments .comments-content { margin-bottom: 0; } .comments a { -webkit-transition: .3s ease all; transition: .3s ease all; }
.comments { margin-top:0; border-top:1px solid $(content.border.color); padding-top:40px; background-color: $(comments.background); color: $(comments.color); } .comments .avatar-image-container, .comments .avatar-image-container img { max-width:42px; max-height: 42px; width: 42px; height:42px; } .comments .avatar-image-container img { margin-top:-42px; } .comments .avatar-image-container:before { content: '\f2be'; font-size:40px; height: 40px; width: 40px; line-height:40px; } .comments .comment-block, .comments .comments-content .comment-replies { margin-left: 60px; } .comments .comment-header .secondary-text { padding:12px; margin-top:-12px; margin-right:-12px; margin-bottom:-12px; box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 60px rgba(0,0,0,.15); } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions { font-size:85%; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions>span>a { } .comments .comment-block .comment-header { background-color: $(comments.header.background); color: $(comments.header.color); } .comments .comment-block .comment-header a { color: $(comments.header.color); } .comments .comment-header .icon.user:before { content: '\f27b'; font-family:'FontAwesome'; margin-left: 10px; opacity: .87; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions a { opacity: .87; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions a:hover { text-decoration: none; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.055); opacity:1; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions a:before { content: '\f112'; font-family:'FontAwesome'; margin-right:8px; } .comments .comment-block .comment-actions .blog-admin>a:before { content: '\f1f8'; font-family:'FontAwesome'; margin-right:8px; } .comments .continue > a:before { content: '\f0e6'; font-family:'FontAwesome'; margin-right:8px; } .comments .continue > a { background-color: transparent; border: 2px solid $(comments.header.background); } .comments .continue > a:hover { background-color: $(comments.header.background); color: $(comments.header.color); } .comments .comment-header .secondary-text { box-shadow: none; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.035); } @media (max-width:468px){ .comments .comment-header .secondary-text { display:none; } }
/* Contact Form */ .contact-wrapper { display:none; } .contact-wrapper .section { padding-top:24px; padding-bottom:24px; } .contact-wrapper .section>.widget:nth-child(1) { margin-top:24px; } .contact-wrapper .section .widget { margin-bottom:40px; } .contact-wrapper .ContactForm .title { display:none; } .contact-wrapper .ContactForm { margin-top:40px; } .ContactForm input, .ContactForm textarea { } .contact-form-error-message-with-border { } .contact-form-error-message-with-border img { width: 18px; height: 18px; } .contact-form-widget { max-width:100%; } .ContactForm .contact-form-button-submit { background-color: $(accent.color); border:0; outline:0; margin-bottom:15px; border-width:0; box-shadow:none; padding:10px 20px; background-image: none; color: #fff; } .ContactForm .contact-form-button-submit:focus, .contact-form-button-submit:hover { outline:0; border:0; box-shadow:none; } .ContactForm [name=contact-form] > div { max-width:100%!important } .ContactForm [name=contact-form] > div img { margin-left:10px; } @media (max-width:767px){ .page-contact.section { margin:0; } }
/* Modals */ @media (min-width:768px){ /* .modal { text-align: center; padding: 0!important; } .modal:before { content: ''; display: inline-block; height: 100%; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: -4px; } .modal-dialog { display: inline-block; text-align: left; vertical-align: middle; } */ } .modal-content .close { position: relative; z-index:2; } .modal-title { margin-bottom:24px; }
/* Cart: Views */ .headerRow { display: none; } .item-total, .cart-summary tr>td:nth-child(2), .simpleCart_total, .price { margin-top: 6px; opacity:.87; font: $(body.heading.font); font-size:inherit; font-weight: 700; } .simpleCart_items { font-size:14px; } .simpleCart_items .table { border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; } .simpleCart_items .table tr,.simpleCart_items .table th { border-color: #eee; } .simpleCart_items .table td { padding: 12px 8px; vertical-align: top; border-color: #eee; } .item-name { max-width: 220px; } .item-name a { color: inherit; } .item-name img { border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.055); width:60px; height: auto; display:inline-block; margin-right:15px; margin-bottom:15px; float:left; } tr>.item-increment, tr>.item-decrement { padding-left:0; padding-right:0; } .item-increment a, .item-decrement a, .item-remove a { width:20px; height:20px; line-height:20px; text-align:center; display:inline-block; margin:0; background-color: #eee; border-radius: 100%; color: inherit; font-weight:700;vertical-align:middle; } .item-increment a, .item-decrement a { visibility:hidden; } tr:hover .item-increment a , tr:hover .item-decrement a { visibility:visible; } tr>.item-name {padding-left:0; word-wrap: break-word; } tr>.item-remove { padding-right:0!important; } tr>.item-total { overflow-wrap: normal; word-break: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align:right; } .item-name p { margin-bottom:5px; } .item-name .small>span+span:before { content: '/'; margin: 0 5px; } @media (max-width:428px){ .item-name img { display:block; float: none; } }
/* Page: Checkout */ #checkout .widget-content { padding-top: 24px; color: $(checkout.alt.color); } #checkout .widget-content h2 { color: $(checkout.alt.color); } .page-checkout { background-color: $(checkout.background); margin:0; display:none; } .form-wrapper { background-color: $(checkout.form); padding:40px 24px ; margin:0 -24px; } .summary-wrapper { } .page-checkout .simpleCart_items { margin-bottom:30px; } .page-checkout .simpleCart_items tr { border-bottom-color: transparent; } .page-checkout .item-increment, .page-checkout .item-decrement, .page-checkout .item-remove { display:none; } .cart-summary { border:0; } .cart-summary tbody > tr > td { padding: 12px 8px; } .cart-summary tr>td:nth-child(2) { text-align:right; } .cart-summary tfoot { font-weight:700; font-size:120%; } .page-checkout .has-error { border-color: red; font-weight:700; } .page-checkout label>span { margin-left:5px; color: red; font-weight:700; } .checkout-empty { padding: 24px 0 40px; color: $(checkout.alt.color); } #form-checkout button { margin-bottom: 10px; } @media (min-width:768px){ .form-wrapper { margin-left:-100%; margin-right:0; padding-left:0; padding-right:0; } .form-wrapper form { margin-left: 50%; padding-right:40px; } }
.main .HTML .title { font-size:21px; text-transform:uppercase; font-weight:700; }
/* Post: Image Zoom */ .post-image-inner { position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .zoomer { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; background-size: cover; transition: transform .5s ease-out; }
/* Page: Categories */ #category { display:none; } .page-category { padding:0; } .category.section { margin: 0; }
/* Feeds */ .feeds { margin:0 0 10px; } .feed-heading { padding:18px 0; margin:0; font-size:21px; text-transform:uppercase; font-weight:700; border-top:1px solid $(content.border.color); } .feed-heading>a { display:inline-block; float:right; font-size:14px; text-transform: capitalize; font-weight: 400; } .feed-heading>a:after { content:"\f105"; font-family: 'FontAwesome'; margin-left: 8px; } .feed img { margin-bottom: 9px;width: 100%;border-radius: 9px; } .feed { margin-bottom:30px; } .feed:last-child { margin-bottom: 40px; } .feed h4 { margin:0 0 15px; font-weight:400; font-size: 14px; opacity: .87;} .feed h4>a { color: inherit; } .feed > div>span { font-size:75%; vertical-align:top; } .feed.disabled { opacity:.54; } @media (max-width:767px){ .feeds .row > div:nth-child(2n+1) { clear: left; } .feed-heading>a { display:block; float:none; text-align: left; margin-top:5px; } } @media (min-width:1200px){ .category .row > div:nth-child(6n+1) { clear: left; } } @media (min-width:992px) and (max-width:1199px){ .category .row > div:nth-child(4n+1) { clear: left; } } @media (min-width:768px) and (max-width:991px){ .category .row > div:nth-child(3n+1) { clear: left; } }
/* Page: Category */ .sort-wrapper { padding: 0 0 0px; margin:0; } .sort-wrapper h2 { margin-top:0; } .sort-wrapper .widget-content > span { margin-right:5px; } .sort-wrapper li { margin-top:0; } .sort-wrapper .dropdown-toggle { min-width:180px; } .sort-wrapper .dropdown-menu { padding-top:5px; padding-bottom:5px; min-width:180px; border-radius:0; } .sort-wrapper .dropdown-menu >li>a,.sort-wrapper .dropdown-menu >li>span { display:block; padding:5px 20px; } .sort-wrapper .dropdown-menu >li>span { font-weight:700; } .sort-wrapper .btn-group button { text-align:left; } .sort-wrapper .btn-group button:after { content:'\f107'; font-family: 'FontAwesome'; float:right; } @media (max-width:767px){ .sort-wrapper h2 { font-size: 150%; } .sort-wrapper .btn-group { float:none!important; text-align:left; } .sort-wrapper .btn-group .btn { float:none!important; text-align:left; } } .btn-view { margin-bottom:10px; }
/* Home: Featured */ #featured1 { margin:0; display:none; }
/* Ads */ .ads { margin:0; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y:hidden; color: inherit; } .ads a { color: inherit; }
.ripple { display: block; position: absolute; background:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13); border-radius: 100%; -webkit-transform:scale(0); -moz-transform:scale(0); -o-transform:scale(0); transform:scale(0); } .animate { -webkit-animation:ripple 0.65s linear; -moz-animation:ripple 0.65s linear; -ms-animation:ripple 0.65s linear; -o-animation:ripple 0.65s linear; animation:ripple 0.65s linear; } @-webkit-keyframes ripple { 100% {opacity: 0; -webkit-transform: scale(2.5); } } @-moz-keyframes ripple { 100% {opacity: 0; -moz-transform: scale(2.5); } } @-o-keyframes ripple { 100% {opacity: 0; -o-transform: scale(2.5); } } @keyframes ripple { 100% {opacity: 0; transform: scale(2.5); } }
/* Product Views */ [data-view=list] .post, [data-view=grid] .post { -webkit-transition: .3s ease all; transition: .3s ease all; } .page-multi [data-view=list] .post .panel { overflow:hidden; border-bottom: 1px solid $(content.border.color); padding-bottom:24px; margin-bottom:24px; } .page-multi [data-view=list] .post:last-child .panel{ border-bottom: 0; } [data-view=list] .post { width: 100%; } [data-view=list] .panel-image { width: 33%; float:left; display:inline-block; margin-right:24px; } .page-multi [data-view=list] .panel-body { padding:0; } [data-view=list] .panel-footer { display: none; } [data-view=list] .post-title { font-size: 120%; } [data-view=list] span, [data-view=list] .btn-save { display:inline-block; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right:10px; } @media (max-width:767px){ [data-view=list] .panel-image { margin-right:12px; } } @media (max-width:428px){ [data-view=list] .ratings, [data-view=list] .btn-save, [data-view=list] .panel-footer { display: none; } [data-view=list] .post-snippet { display:none; } }
[data-view=grid] .post-snippet { display:none; } .page-home .post-snippet { display:none; }
@media (max-width:767px){ .table-responsive { border-color: #eee; } }
/* Product Info */ #product-info { display:none; margin-bottom: 40px; margin-top:24px; } #product-info.panel-group { display:block; } #product-info .panel { border-radius : 0; margin-top:0; margin-bottom:0; border-left:0; border-right:0; border-bottom:0; box-shadow: none; border-color: #eee; } #product-info .panel:last-child { border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; } #product-info .panel-heading { padding:1em 0; border-radius: 0; background-color: transparent; } #product-info .panel-heading a:after { content:'\f068'; font-family: 'FontAwesome'; float: right; } #product-info .panel-heading a.collapsed:after { content:'\f067'; } #product-info .panel-body { padding:24px 0; }
.page-multi .post.disabled { opacity:.54; } .post.disabled .item_add { display: none; } #form-checkout [data-checkout=email], #form-checkout [data-checkout=paypal] { display:none; } .disc { margin:10px auto; } #noscript-wrapper { padding:24px 0; text-align:center; width:100%; background-color: white; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.55); color: #333; font-size: 18px; position:fixed; top:0; left:0; }
body[data-shipping='0'] .shipping-container { display:none; } body[data-tax='0'] .tax-container { display:none; } body[data-cart='0'] #myCart .modal-body-inner, body[data-cart='0'] #myCart .modal-footer { display:none; } .cart-empty { display: none; } body[data-cart='0'] .cart-empty { display:block!important; } #page-checkout { display:block; } body[data-cart='0'] #page-checkout { display:none!important; }
.feed sup, .post-price sup, .simpleCart_shelfItem sup, .modal sup, .simpleCart_items sup, .cart-summary sup { vertical-align:baseline; top: -0.35em; font-size: 70%; }
}]]></b:skin>
<b:template-skin> <b:variable default='960px' name='content.width' type='length'/> <b:variable default='0' name='main.column.left.width' type='length'/> <b:variable default='310px' name='main.column.right.width' type='length'/> <![CDATA[ #layout .container { clear:both; } #layout .header { float:left; display:inline-block; width: 53%; } #layout #header-cart { width: 35%; } #layout #header-ads { width: 94%; clear:both; } #layout .content-wrapper { width:65%; display:inline-block; float:left; } #layout .sidebar-wrapper { width:35%; display:inline-block; float:right; } #layout .footer { width:27%; display:inline-block; float:left; margin:0 1%;} #layout .attribution { clear:both; float:none; width:auto; display:block; } #layout #sitelinks { display:none; } #layout #theme-settings { background-color: #06c; } #layout #theme-plugins { background-color: red; } #layout .attribution, #layout #Attribution1, #layout #Navbar1 { display:block; visibility:visible; } #layout .ads.section { background-color: cyan!important; } #layout .widget .editlink { display:inline-block; padding:4px 12px; margin-right:-10px; margin-bottom:-10px; background-color: #eee; text-transform:uppercase; } #layout .section:before, #layout .footer-wrapper:after {display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } #layout #header:before { content: 'Edit Blog Name or upload image as store logo.'; } #layout #header-cart:before { content: 'Add text at cart and search button.'; } #layout .navbar-collapse:before { content: 'Add links to create main navigation. Use _ before text link to group and auto create navigation dropdown.'; } #layout #slider:before { content: 'Add Image gadget to upload image, add text and caption. Image gadget used here auto construct as a responsive slider.'; } #layout .featured:before { content: 'At any HTML/Javascript gadget add Label in widget body.'; } #layout .main:before { content: 'Edit Sort Labels gadget for Labels to display. Edit text at HTML/Javascript gadget to display at homepage.'; } #layout .page-checkout:before { content: 'Add text and enabled/edit discount alert texts displayed at checkout page.'; } #layout .category:before { content: 'Select labels to auto display posts at category page. /search/label/All'; } #layout .page-contact:before { content: 'Enabled contact form and edit text for contact page.'; } #layout .attribution:before { content: 'Remove or disable Navbar widget.'; } #layout .ads-header:before, #layout .ads-top:before, #layout .ads-bottom:before { content: 'Best for ads and notification display. Leave widget empty or remove to not display.'; } #layout .theme-plugins:before { content: 'Add Google Fonts and Theme Custom Settings/Variables.'; } #layout .footer-wrapper:after { content: 'STORE + THEME PLUGINS USAGES. For performance all javascripts added after contents.'; margin:24px; font-family: Arial;} #layout .theme-js:before { content: 'Add Custom codes and functions here using HTML/Javascript widget.'; } #layout .theme-js { padding-bottom: 40px; } #layout #product-info:before { content: 'Add HTML/Javascript gadget for global product info tabs.'; display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } #layout .ContactForm:before { content: 'Enable Checkout + Contact form by clicking Edit and Save gadget.'; display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } #layout .sidebar:before { content: 'Add, arrange, remove widgets.'; display:block; margin-bottom:10px; text-align:left; padding:12px; color: #f9f9f9; background-color: #3b3b3b; } ]]> </b:template-skin>

<!-- Page loading styles--> <style> #blog-pager { font-size: 33px !important; }
.widget ul { padding: 0 0 0 1.25em; margin: 0; line-height: 1.2; padding-left: 0; list-style: none !important; font-size: 0.875rem !important; } .widget {margin: 0px !important;} #Image1_img {max-width: 116px !important;} .h-220{overflow:hidden;height:220px;border-radius: 12px;} .h-160{overflow:hidden;height:160px;border-radius: 9px;} .h-140{overflow:hidden;height:140px;border-radius: 9px;} .h-120{overflow:hidden;height:120px;border-radius: 9px;} .h-60{overflow:hidden;height:60px;border-radius: 6px;} .page-loading { position: fixed; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; -webkit-transition: all .4s .2s ease-in-out; transition: all .4s .2s ease-in-out; background-color: #fff; opacity: 0; visibility: hidden; z-index: 9999; } .page-loading.active { opacity: 1; visibility: visible; } .page-loading-inner { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 0; width: 100%; text-align: center; -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%); transform: translateY(-50%); -webkit-transition: opacity .2s ease-in-out; transition: opacity .2s ease-in-out; opacity: 0; } .page-loading.active > .page-loading-inner { opacity: 1; } .page-loading-inner > span { display: block; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: normal; color: #666276;; } .page-spinner { display: inline-block; width: 2.75rem; height: 2.75rem; margin-bottom: .75rem; vertical-align: text-bottom; border: .15em solid #bbb7c5; border-right-color: transparent; border-radius: 50%; -webkit-animation: spinner .75s linear infinite; animation: spinner .75s linear infinite; } @-webkit-keyframes spinner { 100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes spinner { 100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); transform: rotate(360deg); } }
</style> <!-- Page loading scripts--> <script> (function () { window.onload = function () { var preloader = document.querySelector('.page-loading'); preloader.classList.remove('active'); setTimeout(function () { preloader.remove(); }, 2000); }; })();
</script>

resizeImage( data:post.firstImageUrl, 72 , "1:1" ) : data:default_image' var='images'> <span class='sr-only item_thumb'><data:images/></span> </b:with> </b:with> <span class='sr-only item_link'><data:post.canonicalUrl/></span> <b:include name='post-metadata'/> </div> <b:include cond='data:post.editUrl' data='post' name='postQuickEdit'/> </b:includable> <b:includable id='post-meta'> <b:comment>Added on static pages only</b:comment> <div class='post-meta'> <span class='post-author'> <!-- <data:top.authorLabel/> --> <i class='fa fa-user-secret fa-lg fa-fw'/> <b:if cond='data:post.authorProfileUrl'> <a class='g-profile' expr:href='data:post.authorProfileUrl' rel='author' title='author profile'> <data:post.author/> </a> <b:else/> <data:post.author/> </b:if> </span> <b:comment> <b:eval expr='data:post.date format "MMM dd YYYY" '/> </b:comment> <span class='post-timestamp'> <i class='fa fa-calendar-o fa-lg fa-fw'/> <b:if cond='data:post.url'> <a class='timestamp-link' expr:href='data:post.url' rel='bookmark' title='permanent link'><abbr class='published' expr:title='data:post.timestampISO8601'><data:post.timestamp/></abbr></a> </b:if> </span> <b:if cond='data:post.allowComments'> <span class='post-comment-link'> <i class='fa fa-comments-o fa-lg fa-fw'/> <b:include cond='data:view.isPost or data:view.isPage' data='post' name='comment_count_picker'/> </span> </b:if> </div> </b:includable> <b:includable id='post-metadata'> <b:with value='"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MowVHfLkoZU/VhgIRyPbIoI/AAAAAAAATtE/qHST4Q2YCCc/s1600/placeholder-image.jpg"' var='default_image'> <b:with value='data:post.firstImageUrl ? entry.content:
Uepatickets es una marca registrada de Multipagos Expresos SRL, proveedor líder de servicios de procesamiento de transacciones, boletería y pago de servicios (en adelante “Uepatickets”).


EL USUARIO ACEPTA VOLUNTARIAMENTE LOS SIGUIENTES TÉRMINOS Y CONDICIONES GENERALES :

Primero: El usuario reconoce que Uepatickets es un agente de cobro e intermediación para la distribución de boletas, a favor de los organizadores o promotores de espectáculos artísticos o deportivos, no es el organizador del evento. El organizador es el responsable de la realización, logística, planificación, ejecución, montaje, riesgos, condiciones, organización y contenido del evento.

Segundo: Todo usuario (en adelante el “Usuario” o “Cliente”) para hacer uso del portal, deberá registrarse previamente en el web site; www.uepatickets.com (en adelante el “Portal”), otorgando información verídica, por lo cual Uepatickets no se hace responsable por cualquier error, falsedad o inexactitud declarada por el Usuario al momento del registro, siendo éste el único responsable de las consecuencias penales que se deriven por tal hecho.  


Tercero: Toda transacción, compra de boletería y pago de facturas efectuado por el Usuario en el Portal, está sujeta a verificación por parte de la entidad bancaria que corresponda. 


Cuarto: No se aceptará ningún tipo de cambio, reintegro, cancelación o devolución, siempre y cuando no sea por una falta imputable al responsable del evento.  Dado lo anterior, todas las ventas procesadas a través de Uepatickets son definitivas, por lo cual los gastos de envío y uso de la plataforma no serán reembolsables.


Quinto: El Usuario reconoce y acepta que cada boleto contiene una numeración o código único o individual que dará derecho a un (1) solo acceso por boleto, por lo que el titular será el único responsable de salvaguardar la confidencialidad del código contenido en el mismo. El Usuario acepta el riesgo de falsificación, copia, manipulaciones o duplicidad en cuyo caso solo la primera persona en presentar el boleto o código tendrá acceso al evento. Un (1) boleto o código equivaldrá siempre a una (1) sola entrada, sujeto a las condiciones del evento.


Sexto: Para el caso de los espectáculos artísticos o deportivos, el Usuario reconoce y acepta que el precio de la boletería es cambiante conforme al momento en el cual se ejecuta la compra. Dicho precio deberá ser previamente informado al Usuario al inicio del proceso de compra, quien definirá de manera libre y voluntaria finalizar o no el mismo. 


Séptimo: Con la finalización de la compra de la boletería, el Usuario reconoce que de manera previa que: i) es responsable de la información personal suministrada al momento del registro en el Portal, ii) ha ingresado de manera correcta el número de tiquetes que desea adquirir, iii) entiende la fecha, hora y lugar en el cual se llevará a cabo el evento, iv) está de acuerdo con el precio de adquisición de la boletería.  


Octavo: Uepatickets en ningún caso es responsable por: i) boletas no reclamadas ni ii) tiquetes recibidos por el Usuario que posteriormente se dañen, deterioren, rompan o pierdan, en consecuencia, Uepatickets no se hará cargo de su reposición. 


Noveno: La postergación o cancelación del evento es asumida directamente por el organizador. En caso de lluvia, fallas técnicas, enfermedad, pandemia, calamidad pública, decisiones gubernamentales, o fuerza mayor, el evento podría ser pospuesto y si sucediera dicha postergación el ticket mantendrá su validez hasta la fijación de una nueva fecha. Si el evento es cancelado o postergado, Uepatickets gestionará ante el organizador el reembolso del costo de la boleta, con excepción de los gastos de envío y uso de la plataforma. Después de haber sido anunciado el aplazamiento o cancelación de un evento, se habilitará un plazo de quince (15) días hábiles para que el Usuario pueda realizar su solicitud de reembolso.

Décimo: Los gastos o cargos por servicios de entrega de boletas, reflejados en el anverso de la presente boleta son aquellos correspondientes a servicios de manejo, envío y uso de sitio web así como también costos operacionales orientados a proporcionar un servicio de calidad y comodidad al adquiriente de la boleta.


Décimo Primero: El Usuario hace constar que fue previamente avisado con anterioridad a la adquisición de la presente boleta de que el organizador se reserva el derecho de admisión de cualquier tipo de bebidas, comidas, cámaras fotográficas, celulares, filmadoras o grabadoras. Está prohibido ingresar todo tipo de armas de fuego o piezas punzantes o que representen peligro, drogas, fármacos, metales, maderas, rollos de papel, fósforos o encendedores, material pirotécnico, punteros laser, envases de vidrio o plástico.


Décimo Segundo:  Para el ingreso a cualquier evento, podrá ser requerido la tarjeta de vacunación físico o digital, con el esquema de vacunación completo requerido en la República Dominicana, hasta tanto por Decreto Presidencial se indique lo contrario. en caso de negarse el ingreso por el incumplimiento del anterior requisito, el valor de la boleta no será reembolsado.


Décimo Tercero:  Cualquier conflicto entre las partes será resuelto conforme a las leyes de la República Dominicana.
